LanguageData.Zombieland_Settings: Hover over any element to read a help text about it to the right. All settings can be changed in-game and are active immediately, they are saved with the game.\n\nTo set defaults for new games, change the settings from the main screen (Options/Mod Settings/Zombieland).
LanguageData.ZombieLandKeyframes: You can add keyframes that define settings in time. Use the slider to check the values in-between. Only settings for keyframes can be edited.
LanguageData.ZombieLandKeyframe0: <- first keyframe (start of the game) . . . future game time ->
LanguageData.Difficulty_ZombielandThreatScale_Info: Controls the difficulty of almost all things in Zombieland like zombie abilities, threat forecast and much more.
LanguageData.ZombiesRisingNearYourBase: A group of zombies appears near your base
LanguageData.ZombiesSpitter: A zombie spitter has entered the map and will siege you
LanguageData.XDaysUntilZombies: Zombies will appear where there is soft soil, dirt, sand or gravel. The construction of floors prevents those zombies from coming out of there.
LanguageData.ZombieBiteInfectionChance: Risk that a zombie bite is infectious
LanguageData.AnyTreatmentStopsInfection: Treatment in a bed stops infections
LanguageData.HoursAfterDeathToBecomeZombie: Hours to become a zombie after death
LanguageData.DeadBecomesZombieMessage: Show a message when someone turns into a zombie
LanguageData.DangerousSituationMessage: Show a message when in danger
LanguageData.CorpsesExtractAmount: Amount of zombie extract per zombie
LanguageData.LootExtractAmount: Amount of loot that zombies drop
LanguageData.RagingZombies: Zombies rage if a group gets too large
LanguageData.WallPushing: Amount of zombies that will push zombies over walls
LanguageData.PlayCreepyAmbientSound: Play creepy ambient sound at night
LanguageData.ConfirmUninstallZombieland: If you continue, you can choose a new save file name and you will return to the main menu after the game is saved. The new save can be loaded without Zombieland.\n\nDo you really want to remove all Zombieland content from the current game?
LanguageData.ActivateDescription: Activates the device. Zombies in the room loose consciousness.
LanguageData.WrongPlacementZombieShocker: The device cannot be placed here.
LanguageData.ZombiesAreBeingPushedOverYourWalls: There are zombies being pushed over your walls! Prevent zombies from cumulating to dense groups.
LanguageData.ColonistBecameAZombieLabel: A colonist turned into a zombie
LanguageData.BodyIsInfectedLabel: This body is infected with the zombie virus!
LanguageData.BodyIsInfectedTooltip: Infected bodies will turn into zombies when they start to rot.
LanguageData.AutoExtractAllowedDescription: Automatically extract zombie serum when no zombies are nearby
LanguageData.AutoExtractForbiddenDescription: Only extract zombie serum when ordered
LanguageData.AutoDoubleTapAllowedDescription: Automatically double tap corpses to prevent them from becoming zombies
LanguageData.AutoAvoidZombiesEnabledDescription: Automatically avoid zombies, except when standing drafted
LanguageData.AutoAvoidZombiesDisabledDescription: Ignore zombies. You need to manually control all actions
LanguageData.ZombieShockerWrongPlacement: The device cannot be placed here
LanguageData.ZombieShockerHasNoBattery: The device has no battery attached
LanguageData.ZombieShockerHasNoRoom: The device has no valid room attached
LanguageData.ZombieShockerLowBatteryState: The device has depleted the attached batteries
LanguageData.DisableRandomApparel: Turn off random apparel for zombies
LanguageData.ChainsawDisabled: Chainsaw cannot be used right now
LanguageData.ChainsawTurnOn: Turn chainsaw on to attack any nearby zombies
LanguageData.ChainsawTurnOff: Turn chainsaw off to conserve fuel
LanguageData.ThumperControlDesc: Define Intensity and Interval for this Zombie Thumper
LanguageData.ToggleStateDesc: Turns the device on or off.
LanguageData.ShowContaminationOverlayToggleButton: Toggle zombie contamination overlay.\n\nThis shows how contaminated things and the ground are, which in turn affects pawns.
